articles.title: Trader Joe's is Bringing Back Their Fan-Favorite Fall Sourdough Flavor, and Fans Are Saying It's â€˜Perfect for French Toast'
articles.author: Julie Andrews
articles.summary: Trader Joe's has released its fall foods, including the returning Apple Cinnamon Sourdough Bread, featuring apple pieces, cinnamon, and brown sugar, retailing for $4.99. Aldi is also bringing back its fall-inspired chicken sausages.

articles.title: Honeycomb Strategy announces marketing and content manager appointment
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: Honeycomb Strategy is investing in proprietary AI tools, creating a suite of AI-powered solutions that integrate behavioral science with smart technology. This new offering aims to provide sharper insights to clients by uncovering information traditional research methods often miss. The 'Science of Loyalty' is also being released soon.

articles.title: Dongwon Group announced on the 15th that it has unveiled the second TV CF "Talent Edition" of the br..
articles.author: A Whimsical Lake
articles.summary: Dongwon Group has launched its second TV commercial, 'Talent Edition,' under the 'Respond the Need' brand slogan campaign. This campaign highlights the values of 'challenge, creation, and together' through various episodes, and the commercial can be viewed on Dongwon Group's official YouTube channel, 'Dongwon TV.'

articles.title: Affordable Beauty Products You'll Love To The Last Drop
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The article highlights numerous new and affordable beauty products that serve as alternatives to pricier counterparts. It covers various categories such as skincare, makeup, and hair care, offering information on each product's unique attributes and comparing them to well-known high-end brands.

articles.title: Lava Bold N1 5G Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Lava officially announced the Lava Bold N1 5G on September 05, 2025. The 5G smartphone features a 6.75-inch display, Unisoc T765 processor, 4GB RAM, 64GB/128GB storage options, a 13MP rear camera, a 5MP front camera, and a 5000 mAh battery with 10W wired charging. It is available in Royal Blue and Champagne Gold.

articles.title: LDV Deliver 9 campervan hits Australian market under $90k
articles.author: James Chung
articles.summary: LDV has launched the Deliver 9 campervan in Australia, priced at $89,990. The campervan includes features such as a kitchen sink, fridge, microwave, cooktop, toilet, and showers. It's powered by a 2.0-litre turbo-diesel engine and has a 2.56 kWh lithium battery with a 190kW solar panel.

articles.title: Boe Launches Advanced ADS Pro Screen for Affordable Smartphones: Impressively Budge the $150 Threshold with New IPS LCD Technology
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: BOE has launched its new ADS Pro display technology, which is targeted towards the affordable smartphone market. The new IPS LCD technology will bring features that were previously reserved for higher-end OLED panels like a high refresh rate, wide color gamut, and high brightness, with brands like Transsion Holdings (Tecno, Infinix, Itel), Xiaomi (redmi, POCO), Realme, and Motorola expected to adopt the new technology.

articles.title: PowerWash Simulator 2 is Coming to Switch 2 Alongside PS5, Xbox Series X
articles.author: William D'Angelo
articles.summary: FuturLab will launch PowerWash Simulator 2, a new pressure washing simulation game, this fall. The game will be available on Nintendo Switch 2, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, and Microsoft Store. PowerWash Simulator 2 features new locations, improved visuals, and new equipment.

articles.title: Amazon Wants To Scan Your Body To Make Perfectly Fitting Shirts
articles.author: Slashdot
articles.summary: Amazon launched a new service called "Made for You" which allows customers to create custom-made T-shirts. The service utilizes a virtual body double created from user-submitted measurements and photos taken with the app's 3D body scanner, allowing for personalized fit and design choices.

articles.title: Google adds 'The Mandalorian's' Grogu as a 3D object on Search
articles.author: Engadget
articles.summary: Google has introduced a new 3D augmented reality object, 'Baby Yoda' (Grogu), to its Search platform. This addition expands Google's collection of AR treasures available to users through Search queries.

articles.title: Galaxy chocolate fans divided over new product some think is 'pointless'
articles.author: Rahima Miah
articles.summary: Galaxy has launched a new green-colored white hot chocolate. This product, a variation on its traditional instant hot chocolate drink, tastes like white chocolate. It was spotted at Home Bargains.

articles.title: Flipkart Big Billion Days: Motorola Edge 60 Pro gets a starting price of Rs 24,999
articles.author: Pratyay
articles.summary: Motorola Edge 60 Pro will be available at a starting price of Rs 24,999 during the Big Billion Day sale on Flipkart starting September 22. The device features a 6.7" pOLED display, MediaTek Dimensity 8350 SoC, up to 12GB RAM, 256GB storage, a 50MP triple camera system, and a 6000mAh battery with 90W fast charging.

articles.title: Can Amazon's AI Voices Revolutionize Customer Reviews?
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Amazon is integrating AI-powered voice features into its platform to allow customers to listen to reviews. This includes Neural Text-to-Speech (NTTS), review summarization, and sentiment analysis to enhance the shopping experience. Several companies are experimenting with AI-powered voice reviews, with Amazon already allowing users to ask Alexa to read product reviews aloud.

articles.title: Lidl Ireland fans rushing to buy new pram dupe in middle aisle â€“ and it's â‚¬45 cheaper than the real deal
articles.author: Macarten Burke
articles.summary: Lidl Ireland has launched the Osann Portable Baby Stroller, priced at â‚¬34.99 and available until September 30, as a dupe for the Lionelo Foldable Buggy. Aldi Ireland has also released The Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Handle for â‚¬5.99, available in multiple colors, as a dupe for Stanley's IceFlowâ„¢ Bottle Fast Flow.

articles.title: Galaxy chocolate fans divided over new product some think is 'pointless'
articles.author: Rahima Miah
articles.summary: Galaxy has launched a new green-colored white hot chocolate, a variation of its traditional instant hot chocolate drink, available at Home Bargains for Â£2.79. The new product tastes like white chocolate, but its green color has received mixed reactions from consumers, with some questioning its purpose and others finding it fun, especially for children.

articles.title: Can an Amazon AI voice guide you better than customer product reviews? It's starting to try
articles.author: Trevor Laurence Jockims
articles.summary: Amazon has launched "Hear the Highlights," an AI-powered feature that provides audio descriptions of products. The service relies on a large language model to summarize information from Amazon's product catalog, customer reviews, and other web sources into short audio clips. Currently available to all U.S. customers in the mobile app, the feature covers over one million products.

articles.title: How Netflix, Zappos, and Salesforce Win Customer Loyalty
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Netflix employs AI to analyze user viewing habits, preferred viewing times, and watch duration, to personalize the viewing experience through movie and TV show recommendations. Salesforce uses AI to analyze how each company uses its software, and then, based on the data, Salesforce provides personalized dashboards, suggests training modules and delivers targeted suggestions to help each business maximize its investment.

articles.title: Supermarket that 'bends over backwards for customers' launches up to 50% off sale
articles.author: Lucy Addicott
articles.summary: Waitrose has launched a 'Great Savings Event' offering discounts up to 50% on various products. The event, which runs until October 7, 2025, includes offers on household essentials, food items, and other goods. Customers can also purchase a Waitrose Delivery Pass for complimentary deliveries.

articles.title: How to Transform Photos Into 3D Models: 25+ Nano Banana Prompts and Tips
articles.author: Deepu Mohan
articles.summary: Google has launched Nano Banana, an AI-powered tool within Google AI Studio, that allows users to generate 3D figurines from photos and text prompts. This tool is designed to democratize 3D figurine creation, making it accessible for creating various digital collectibles like anime figures, plush toys, and superhero models. Users can upload photos, input descriptive prompts, and quickly generate professional-looking 3D models.

articles.title: Baileys releases new festive flavour based on iconic chocolate and shoppers say they â€˜need' to try it
articles.author: Emily Mee
articles.summary: BAILEYS has launched a new limited-edition festive flavor, Baileys x Terry's Chocolate Orange Irish Cream Liqueur, which is available at Sainsbury's stores for Â£16.50, or Â£11 with a Nectar card. The drink combines Baileys Original Irish Cream with chocolate and zesty orange flavors.

articles.title: How to withstand the Samsung Galaxy S11 Ultra tablet with such an offer?
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra, featuring a 14.6-inch AMOLED X2 display and Galaxy AI integration for enhanced productivity. Customers can avail of a â‚¬200 bonus upon purchase along with other benefits like a Book Cover Keyboard Slim, a 12-month Microsoft 365 subscription, and discounts through the Samsung Shop App.

articles.title: You Probably Haven't Heard Of These 34 Problem-Solving Products Yet â€” Let's Fix That
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Dae launched Dae's 3-In-1 Styling Cream & Taming Wand. The wand features a soft built-in brush that smooths flyaways using a blend of dragon fruit, prickly pear seed oil, and meadowfoam seed oil for a sleek look.

articles.title: 7 Krave readies Amazon-inspired marketplace
articles.summary: 7Krave is launching its '7Krave Marketplace' on September 27, an all-in-one digital marketplace targeting a wide range of sellers in Jamaica. 7Krave is also debuting '7Krave Corporate', a new service which provides better lunch solutions for businesses.

articles.title: 45 Useful Products That Will Be Hard To Resist
articles.author: Amanda Davis
articles.summary: The article highlights various products, including the Brumate Era 40-ounce water bottle, which features a leak-proof design with a metal straw and silicone top, and RobeCurls heatless hair curler, made with satin to prevent tangled hair, offering bouncy curls without heat damage. It also features "Magic Tap" automatic drink dispenser, which is spillproof and fits into water, milk, and juice mugs!

articles.title: Lidl launches sunrise gadget that helps you wake up easier on gloomy winter mornings â€“ & is Â£79 cheaper than posh brand
articles.author: Aiya Zhussupova
articles.summary: Lidl has launched the Auriol Sunrise Alarm Clock, priced at Â£17.99, which simulates natural light to help users wake up gradually. The alarm clock features customizable settings, natural sounds, and aims to provide a high-end alarm experience at a budget-friendly price. Additionally, Lidl released the Silentnight Snugsie Wearable Blanket for Â£9.99.

articles.title: Unveiling ChatGPT's Surprising Uses: From Bedtime Stories to Shopping Codes
articles.summary: OpenAI is introducing a new pricing structure for ChatGPT Enterprise. This includes a new credit system and reports of discounted subscriptions. These changes come amidst increasing competition in the AI chatbot market.

articles.title: Sir James Dyson reveals how AI will clean your house & why he's flogging delicious snacks to Brits instead of retiring
articles.author: Head
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the PencilVac, a slim vacuum cleaner, and is introducing the Dyson Spot+Scrub AI Robot, a floor-cleaning robot that autonomously scrubs spots. Additionally, the new Dyson AirWrap hair styler will automatically adjust its settings based on hair type and styling preferences. Dyson also produces strawberries all year round using green electricity.

articles.title: Driving Forward
articles.summary: Pakistan has introduced its first AI-driven testing car in Punjab. This initiative aims to streamline driving tests, reduce human error, and enhance transparency within the system. It signifies Pakistan's intention to integrate into the global technology landscape and potentially foster growth across other sectors.

articles.title: M&S slashes 40% off touch of silk mattress protector that 'feels amazing'
articles.author: Jessica Brunt
articles.summary: M&S has reduced the price of its Touch of Silk Mattress Protector by 40%. The protector, available in single, double, king, and super king sizes, is designed to add comfort and is machine washable. It has received positive reviews for its quality and fit.

articles.title: PowerWash Simulator 2 Will Wash Its Way to Switch 2 Later This Year
articles.author: Deepak Chongtham
articles.summary: PowerWash Simulator 2 is launching a new campaign, introducing base-building elements, and offering three new locations. The game, currently in development for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, PC, and Nintendo Switch, is scheduled for release in late 2025, featuring online and split-screen co-op.

articles.title: I tried Aldi's range of rosÃ©-tinted surprises to see which blush bottle took me back to summer
articles.author: Senior Reporter
articles.summary: Aldi is offering a diverse range of rosÃ© wines, including the Specially Selected Austrian Zweigelt RosÃ© with cherry and raspberry notes, the elegant White Island Spanish RosÃ©, the crisp Jolie by Juliette from France, and the unconventional Rosorange. Each wine offers a unique flavor profile, catering to various palates and occasions.

articles.title: 'M&S mini dress made me reconsider the ban on black clothes in my wardrobe'
articles.author: Bethan Shufflebotham
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer (M&S) is promoting its Floral Textured Mini Relaxed Shift Dress, priced at Â£49.50, as a versatile option for the festive season and beyond. The dress features a 60s style silhouette, floral appliquÃ© detailing, and is designed for both casual and formal occasions.

articles.title: You'll Feel Naked Without These 25 Beauty Products On
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: Lottabody launched Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse, which moisturizes and tames frizz. Sol de Janeiro introduced Hair And Body Fragrance Mist, resembling their Bum Bum Cream scent. Shark released FlexStyle Air Styling hair tool for versatile hair styling. E.l.f launched Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara. Summer Fridays introduced Pink Sugar tinted lip butter balm.

articles.title: 34 Products With Disgusting Before And After Photos
articles.author: Danielle Healy
articles.summary: The article introduces a range of cleaning products and tools designed for various applications. These products include solutions for hard water stains, pet messes, oven cleaning, hand care, and even tongue scraping, each offering a targeted solution to specific cleaning or maintenance needs.

articles.title: Samsung's latest iPad rival is Â£50 off
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Tab S10 Lite, an Android tablet, on September 5th. The new model, typically priced at Â£329, is currently available on Amazon with a Â£50 discount. The Galaxy Tab S10 Lite features a 10.9' display, Galaxy AI features, an 8MP rear camera, and a battery offering up to 16 hours of video playback.

articles.title: 10 semi automatic washing machine starting at â‚¹5000: Top affordable picks for budget friendly laundry care
articles.summary: LG, Samsung, Godrej, VW, Haier, Voltas Beko, and Ionstar are launching new semi-automatic washing machine models. These machines feature high RPM motors, multiple wash programs, energy-efficient designs, and features like rat-repellent technology and specialized pulsators for improved cleaning. The models cater to various household sizes with capacities ranging from 6.5 kg to 11 kg.

articles.title: Fans of The Body Shop can get Â£128 worth of products for just Â£60 this weekend
articles.author: Jada Jones
articles.summary: The Body Shop has unveiled its yearly Classic Beauty Advent Calendar, priced at Â£60. The calendar features a range of miniature shower gels, body butters, hair care items, full-size face masks, lip balms, and hand creams, with a total value of Â£128 worth of products.  It is available now.

articles.title: Gen Z's top 20 favourite scents revealed - with one surprising entry
articles.author: Andy Chivers
articles.summary: Unilever is focusing on understanding Gen Z's fragrance preferences to innovate faster and create relevant products. They are investing in blending science, creativity, and cultural insights to develop new fragrances tailored to Gen Z's preferences, who view fragrance as a form of self-expression. The company aims to shape the next chapter in fragrance based on these insights.

articles.title: Unlock Extra Lighting Flexibility with the Nix Mini 3 Color Sensor: Daily Photography Deal for Enhanced Light Management
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Nix has launched the Nix Mini 3 Color Sensor, a portable device for accurate color matching. It utilizes advanced sensor technology to capture colors from surfaces and convert them into RGB, HEX, and CMYK values. The Nix Mini 3 connects via Bluetooth to the Nix Toolkit app, providing access to a database of over 200,000 colors and color matching to premium libraries via subscription.

articles.title: 'Bewdy' created for today's beauty lovers who want authenticity â€“ Abiodun Caston-Dada
articles.author: Ayo Onikoyi
articles.summary: Bewdy launched a mobile application aimed at transforming how Nigerians access beauty services and professionals. The platform offers convenience, choice, and authenticity for beauty lovers, while also providing visibility and growth opportunities for professionals. The app streamlines the experience from discovery to booking and payments.

articles.title: Sugar Cosmetics and Myntra launch Gen-Z focused brand
articles.author: Abhijeet Kabad
articles.summary: Sugar Cosmetics and Myntra have launched Molten Beauty, a new brand targeting Gen-Z. The brand focuses on 'skin-first' hybrid beauty products combining care and color, designed to be breathable and weightless. Developed over 12-15 months in Sugar's R&D labs, the products were tested on individuals under 30.

articles.title: Forget full-frame â€“ OM System's latest telephoto zoom proves that Micro Four Thirds is a ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: OM System launched the 50-200mm F2.8 telephoto zoom lens. The new lens is the brand's second pro 'white' lens. It offers features and performance that surpass full-frame lenses.

articles.title: Missed Apple's iPhone 17 Event? Here's a Quick Recap of Every New Announcement
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Apple held an event featuring new product reveals. The event showcased key moments and new products from Apple.

articles.title: Infinix deepens Nigerian presence with flagship store in Abuja
articles.author: Sami Tunji
articles.summary: Infinix has opened a flagship store in Abuja, Nigeria and launched the GT 30 Pro, its first true gaming flagship phone. The GT 30 Pro features a Dimensity 8350 Ultimate processor, 3D Vapour Cooling, a 1.5K 144Hz AMOLED display, JBL dual speakers, a 108MP AI camera, and a 5500mAh battery with fast and wireless charging.
